altSnapByDefault.name: Snap to grid directions by default
altSnapByDefault.hint: If true, rotation will snap to 45°/60° by default unless you hold the 'Alternative Rotation (snap)' key modifier, inverting its behavior.

smoothRotation.name: Smooth rotation
smoothRotation.hint: If true, will reduce soft snapping from 5-degree increments to 0.1 degree increments.

fastPreview.name: Fast preview
fastPreview.hint: If true, there will be no lag when rotating, but other players won't see the change until you let go.

rotationUpdateFrequency.name: Rotation update frequency
rotationUpdateFrequency.hint: Only applies if Fast Preview is disabled. Default 60 (times per second). Increase this for smoother yet possibly laggier rotation.

disableSingleArrowVfx.name: Disable visual effect (hide the orange arrow)
disableSingleArrowVfx.hint: When rotating a single thing, this setting will make it so that no arrow is shown.  This is useful if e.g. your tokens emit light in a cone, or have very obvious facing.

alternativeRotation.name: Alternative Rotation
alternativeRotation.hint: Hold this key while having token(s) selected to make the token(s) turn towards the cursor. Hold Shift to snap to grid directions (45°/60°).

alternativeRotationSnap.name: Alternative Rotation (snap)
alternativeRotationSnap.hint: Hold this modifier key while using Alternative Rotation to snap to grid directions (45°/60°).
